content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep in bed when i heard a sound and a strong light at my north window. it lit up my bedroom despite black out style curtain that was not completely set to block out everything. at first, i thought someone was in my back yard with a flashlight. then i saw this spherical thing at my east window which only had blinds where i could see something of what it was. it was about beach ball sized and it had a single red light about 3" just above center. there were other lights that were golden white, blue white and a few tiny blue lights. they were mostly on all the time though some went out for a bit before coming back on. my bedroom was lit up fairly bright. the object then move back toward the north side of my house where i noticed a red light on my white painted wall.  it was just weird about 1" in diameter size and was about 6 feet off the floor and about 3-4 inches from the wall and about 4-5 feet from where i was in bed. this went on for several minutes as it seemed to turn a few inches toward the south before returning to where it began. it then blinked out. suddenly, a very bright blue white light appeared in the same spot where the red light disappeared and i felt like i was hit with static charge. i threw off my blanket getting ready to run but i then became frozen in a half rise position from the bed. after what seemed a minute, i felt myself begin to float where a secondary light behind the blue white light appeared that was sort of purplish white. i then suddenly dropped back on to the edge of the bed where i tumbled onto the floor.  i was sort of stunned by the fall that i climbed to sit back on the edge of the bed where i looked up and saw what looked like a sort of face in a hazy way. it was sort of like a people describe as a grey i guess but it also did not really look like the traditional depictions either. i am not really certain i can explain in words but maybe i can draw it or someone with art skill can help. this face remained for about 40 seconds then there was a big flash of light like photo flash. the object outside was on the north side of the house as i could see a bit of it about 10 feet off the ground where it went straight up. i needed to go to the bathroom and went where my abdomen hurt. i discovered a half moon 2nd degree burn there at about 3-4 inches across. 

i have not slept in my bed room since and it bothers me that i had such a burn on my person. 

fyi: bedroom sits in the northeast side of the house with a north and east wall. only 2 windows. additionally, neighbor dogs barking wildly but then those dogs always bark 24/7 so that owners or other pretty much ignore them. but on night in question they were barking very aggressively. i did look at my clock when the light switch from north to east window as it was right next to my head. it showed 4:19am so event began a few minutes before that and it was 4:57am when i went to the bathroom.
content.summary: Object hovered at north window. noise and lights woke me from bed the went to east window

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen, getting a cup of coffee. looked out to see what at first i thought was a very very large plane moving extremely slow across the southwest sky. it had blinking lights, yellow, golden in color, looked to be the shape of a triangle. the lights were 3-4 spaced on either side.   i ran to get my binoculars as my son was a pilot.   i am very familiar with planes. at first i thought it might have been a larger plane.
 this object was moving so slow, a normal plane could not stay up in the sky given the speed of this object. no sounds.
 by the time i got my binoculars, it was moving past trees, headed towards avon lake. 
i saw another report made earlier from someone that also saw  a light over the lake the same day. i am not sure what time this person saw the object they reported but my sighting was between 8-8:30 pm.
yesterday, december 7th, i was looking out my kitchen window and noticed how pretty the clouds were. i grabbed my camera and took a few pictures to show my husband. 
attached is one of the regular pictures i took with nothing in it but the clouds. i took several more and then noticed an "object" appeared on one of the frames. i did not see this object when i was snapping the photos but it is there. looks like a round classic ufo...I tried to blow it up to see it better but the camera i had in my hands was a small cool pix. 
i have seen numerous sightings here. i also have another video of one we saw a few years ago.
when you view the picture, look at the top left hand corner. you may have to blow it up to view but the picture prior to that, you just see the clouds, nothing else. i didn't want to upload all the other pictures to make a point. i have them on file though. you can see the object in dscn 3078.
content.summary: I live across from lake erie. i was in my kitchen, saw a huge object, slowly, moving across the sky. at first i thought it may be plane as we are so close to the airport but this object was moving extremely slow. it was huge!  triangular in form

content.detailedDescription: I had been stargazing late one evening, until the early morning hours. i had my attention set on a particular group of stars in the night sky. when suddenly, the stars i had been looking at seemed to just dissappear, as if a light switch had been turned off, and the starlight just went out. then, several more stars began doing the same. - just disappearing from view. i suddenly noticed a black mass drifting across the sky but couldn't make out what it was right away. i strained my eyes, and shielded the light from the street lamp across from me, i couldn't make out the shape until it turned towards the south west. it was then, that i could see that it was triangular in shape. no lights, no sound. i was in shock by its massive size, it must have been over 2 football fields in size! my first reaction was to run , but but i was so captivated by what i was seeing, i froze, and just stood there watching in amazement. - it's not everyday i see anything like that. it seemed to float through the air. kinda like a blimp, but slower. anything that huge, traveling that slow would just fall out of the sky. i know what i had seen that early morning,  and it wasn't man-made, nor from this world. i'll always remember it until my last days on this earth.
content.summary: Observed triangular shaped craft, no lights, no sound, just solid black silhouette. size of 2 football fields/ staduim.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving to ucf and saw what looked like a strange bright airplane light flying through a low cloud but then it stopped in mid air and turned orange and brightened still standing still and started to drip something molten from the bottom. it then turned white like a star then faded out.
content.summary: Looked like plane headlights in cloud then became really bright and orange and stopped moving and started dripping somwthing from the bottom. then turned white like a star and faded out

content.detailedDescription: Driving eastbound on 364 between bryan rd and k.  looking out front windshield saw object flickering in distance.  size of object from my pov was smaller than my fingernail if held up against it for perspective.  light around object was yellowish white.  lights would pulsate/flicker than would be steady on.  as i got past the object the light was off and it was black, by this time i was looking outside my driver's side window.  it was very small (due to height in the sky).  something i noticed was a small white exhaust trail behind it, but again it didn't appear to be moving.  commercial planes were flying near it but in a different flight path, they were lower and did not appear to be approaching or noticing the object.  by the time i got to mid rivers mall drive it was behind me and i could no longer locate.  i don't know what this was, but it was something i have never seen before and cannot explain.  i couldn't take a picture due to driving.
content.summary: Hovering in sky, glowing then flickering lights, then no lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work to ups and i saw this blue orb flying sideways back and forth then it disappeared.??
content.summary: Blue orb would show up then disappear, started to move side ways then took off, and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was out checking my cattle at night and heard a strange noise to the east. i saw a glowing flying object that did not move like a plane or a helicopter. it flew over my field and hovered for a short period of time and instantly soared to the west. i have never seen anything fly like this before. my neighbor has described similar sightings to me in the past.
content.summary: Unknown flying object flew over property

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Back yard, bright lights on ships. smaller round lights going back and forth to main ships while blinking off at times. 5 lights in a row with 2 under them that seemed to be stationary. went to get cousin to verify also never saw objects that looked and moved that way as well. both our cell cameras would not work. went to get video cam, gone.
content.summary: 2 mothers, shape of pointed ships, 2 small lights back and fourth,,5 in row,2 below them

content.detailedDescription:
We have a mystery, locally. about 12 pm, many people felt/heard a boom and shaking. some people reported that is was followed by a high pitched whine. the area that seems to have gotten the worst effects was lake jackson, about 12 miles from us. some people as far as alvin (about 35 miles away ne), and brazos bend state park, (about 30 mi n) said they had experienced it also. more recently, someone said that it had been reported as far away as cypress, (80 m n), and porter tx, (81 m ne), although those are unsubstantiated and single reports, as opposed to the hundreds of people who have been blowing up local facebook threads. 
police have checked all local chemical plants, all possible companies that place explosions to map geologic stuff, nothing. no natural gas explosions in residential areas. no major fires. 
our only local paper has a thread going on their website, no news of what might have caused it.
one of the houston news channels sent a reporter, and it was treated about as credibly as a santa sighting. (country hicks imagined feeling stuff).
so far, we have a mass delusion. hundreds of people in the area, especially in lake jackson, felt their houses shake, and heard a loud rumble like thunder, although skies were clear.
a friend in detroit, tx, about 350 miles north, read my post on facebook, and said that at about 11:30 am she had heard a loud and odd rumble of thunder, and even brought it to her husband's attention. they, also, were under clear skies.
content.summary: Loud rumble like thunder. shook houses. followed by whine.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving down w richmar traveling west around 9:35pm on dec. 7, 2016. within a half mile of reaching the stop sign of las vegas blvd i saw two orb like objects in the west sky flickering reddish light traveling east. i noticed them because they didn't look like a plane or helicoptor or anything i've seen before. when i first saw them i thought they looked odd and a it made me feel curious so i drove across the street to see if i can get closer. one of them changed direction to the south and the other one went north then all faintly disappeared in mid sky. three more appeared in the lower part of the western sky and did the same immediately after the first two but formed a very wide triangle pattern across the sky then faintly disappeared. then three more traveled out of the lower western sky again and like the others did, two of them changed direction to the south and the last one traveled north but then quickly traveled towards me coming east and came within about a quarter mile where it started to descend, it was close enough to where i could see it was red in color but no longer emitting any light and appeared to look like two bubbles connected to each other. it descended out of view and appeared to be landing near the highway or in nearby neighborhoods.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Eight ufo's over south las vegas blvd

content.detailedDescription: At about 6:56 pm i was outside and noticed a large redish ball of light that appeared to be motionless in the sky at about 95 degrees magnetic from my location. it was very bright, and at first i thought it was a parachute flare like those used by the army. i am a retired army veteran, and one of my specialies was as a redeye missile gunner, so i am expert in visual aircraft recognition and have never seen an aircraft emit a light of this color or intensity. it appeared much brighter than the planet venus, which was clearly visible to the west of my location at that time. i observed it for about 3 minutes, then it abruptly disappeared.
content.summary: Brightly glowing redish globe that seemed to hover for about 3 minutes then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 1am on dec.3 2016 in pinconning mi. taking my dog outside. i saw a bright white object shoot across the sky. it looked just like a huge meteor with a smoke trail really low. it lit up my back yard and trees. but this object made no sound. if a meteor was that big and low everyone should have heard it but it was completely silent.
content.summary: Bright white round object shot across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down route 530 in browns mills new jersey at around 10:45 p.M. headed west when i looked out my right side window and i seen two orange glowing orbits one was higher than the other it looked like it was melting like a candle but none of the light went down to the ground it just stayed intact with the orbit i could not stop at the time i had traffic behind me i wanted to stop but there was no shoulder on the road the orbits we're over the cranberry bogs when i first seen them i didn't know what it was i still don't know then i started thinking maybe military flares but i looked them up online and they illuminate the area these did not illuminate the area they only illuminated themselves the orange glow coming from them this area is just outside fort dix army base
content.summary: Orange orbit looked like it was melting was illuminating orange glo

content.detailedDescription: Traveling to dinner, my wife and i observed a few bright lights in the sky. as we traveled closer we noticed that the lights were not moving over head as a normal plane would, they remained on one side of the highway. traveling farther down the road we observed that there seemed to be no tail as a normal plane, it was more of a boomerang shape. as we slowed the car we both stared up at the object still remaining motionless in the sky with bright lights which seemed to be three on both "wings". as we traveled by the object we noticed it still had not moved. we lost sight of the lights a few moments later as we traveled farther down  the highway. discussing the thing we saw in the sky, we turned off the highway and stopped at a red light only to have the object come over the hill at a high rate of speed and swoop over the road and continue heading west toward the river. my wife and myself where concerned as we have never seen anything like this before
content.summary: Bright lights hovering in the sky uniformed pattern

content.detailedDescription: Observed around 830pm on 12/07/15 on interstate 95 southbound on the us highway 1 overpass in daytona beach fl. before i was able to record i saw what looked like a shooting star. it fell downward looked like a orange ball of glowing light, lighting up the clouds around it, it also had a light trail. it then went straight upward and disappeared then reappeared around the same spot. i had stopped to record on my phone where i held the phone steady so the movement of the object is the object itself moving not the video. it glowed and moved around almost in circles hovering, then disappeared shortly after the camera automatically stopped recording due to full storage.
content.summary: On side of interstate

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/1/16 at about 7pm i was standing in a parking lot near mill avenue and the 60, talking with two other guys, all of a sudden i see an abnormally large (size of a penny) bluish-white ball of light shoot from behind my head, south to north, and travel a fairly long distance, maybe 5 seconds total, and then blink out. it was at least 20 times larger than any shooting star i've ever seen, and traveled about 10 times further at least from the time i noticed it. one of the other guys saw it too, he didn't think it was a shooting star either. 

note: is there any way that i could find out if anyone else saw it? i'd welcome an email if anyone is actually reading this.
content.summary: Very large bluish-white ball moved from south to north and blinked out

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home around 8 pm in december 1974. i got out of the car and noticed a pulsating orb about the size of a full moon. it was totally silent. shortly a second orb joined the first and then a third. the three pulsating orbs just hovered in the sky in a triangular formation above me at about a 45 degree angle above the horizon.. in a short time one of the orbs shot straight upward at unbelievable speed. if it was piloted, no pilot could survive those g forces. the second and third orbs shot upward shortly after the first. i definitely felt these objects were under intelligent control as their movements were not random appearing coordinated. i was a school administrator in the county and told no one except my wife. i am retired now and wanted to make a record of this before i die. this sighting did not disturb me but filled me with wonderment and awe.
content.summary: Saw a pulsating orb the size of a full moon. joined by two other orbs . totally silent. shot upward at great speed

content.detailedDescription: I was taking picture of mnts when i white object about size of golball apereared it followed ridge down mnt and came in my direction it came within 10 feet hovered for few seconds then went straight up towards the sun and disapeared
content.summary: Taking pictures of mnt object apeared coming down ridge come over towards me hovered then di

content.detailedDescription:
Night vision red camera is all that sees it.  naked eyes and normal light will not.  
because it could be anything from a stow away on a ufo to a drone and i live next to fort riley and ksu and the ksu bio research, i think we need to talk.
lots more information and assistance with the right agreement.  
my property value is kind of shaky right now and i fear for what may need to happen.
i trust you more than the alternative to report to and this needs addressed by someone above my pay grade.
still active.

i am posting what i had on fb.
content.summary: It jumped / flew up, across and down in front of security camera.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving to store and seen it far away at first then drove bout half mile before stopping. we both were amazed at the size of it and it was just floating. there were two smaller ones that were moving around the big one they were all very black oval and flat. we could not hear them making any sounds. we were both very emotionally disturbed from the size of it and actually feared for our safety because we have never seen anything like this. the big one looked as big as a football field the smaller ones one third of its size. we took two photos and took off to the store as we were frightened. they were gone 15 minutes later on the way home. you have to zoom in on the photos as these things were over a mile away.
content.summary: Huge black oval flat ufo just hovering with 2 smaller ones moving around it.

content.detailedDescription: While driving west on rt 78 i observed what looked like a black, diamond shaped ufo hovering in the air. i took out my phone and tried to take a video but i had to take the next exit. the video is very short and not very clear but perhaps it can be enhanced.
content.summary: Saw a black diamond shaped ufo hovering while driving west on rt 78. short video.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I came out at night to do exactly what i did and that is film a ufo .It is my hobby
content.summary: Star like shape in the night sky appeared to be moving as if it were airplane showed no signs of modern aircraft moved at increasing rate

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my balcony looking out into the dark ocean at about 11 pm when i saw 3 lights appear in the water about 20 ft from beach.They moved very fast through the water at times disappearing and reappearing in different spot.The water is about 15 ft deep in that area.They appeared to be searching the area.At times it looked like a light beam appeared on top of the water..I took video and pictures and asked hotel about night scuba dives or lights in area,they said no nothing was going on during that time, this occurred 3 more time over my 14 day stay always after 11pm
content.summary: Standing on hotel balcony facing ocean after 11pm on few occasions i saw shinning lighted orbs in water about 15 ft from beachfront, the lights moved in erratic directions,at times disappearing into the dark ocean and reappearing in another spot..

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of december 3, 2016, my best friend and i finished eating dinner at a local restaurant in downtown orange, california. it was 21:10, which we just looked at our watches because the restaurant closed and asked us to kindly wrap up our meal moments earlier. upon walking south-bound on glassell, from the restaurant, i looked up in the sky and noticed that there was a bright orange star-like object that could not have been mars because of it's brightness. i told my friend about it immediately, which he agreed it was not the normal size and very orange. i tried to locate venus to confirm it was not that planet, but did take note that the glowing object was below the feet of the orion constellation. it was vaguely noticeable that the object was moving, so we stood by a palm tree to gauge its movement. we could see that it was slightly moving westward. the orange orb was occasionally changing in intensity. just before it disappeared completely, the glow had a noticeable flicker, than it vanished. we were able to take a few pictures during the time (different phone models), but the orange color showed up in the pictures as white. we walked around a little bit more to walk-off our dinner that we just ate and talk about the experience.
content.summary: mars-like orb as bright as venus hovering near downtown orange, ca. moved very slow to the south west before flickering and disappearing instantly.

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving port charlotte mall.
missing time of 1 hour and 40 minutes.
i was accompanied by boyfriend who also noticed the missing time lapse.
i felt terror and couldn't sleep for months.  i still have sleep disorders.  i fight sleep each night and have to take medication.
cancer of the right nostril surgery i had 6 injections to numb the area.
3 days later i removed a triangle out of my nasal passage it was dangling there when i would breathe.  i asked the plastic surgeon if he put anything in my nose to rebuild it.  only a skin graph from tissue behind my right ear.  i have a cat scan prior to removal of object. i threw the object away thinking who would believe me, or is it a tracking device.
content.summary: I was with my boyfriend at the port charlotte mall. an hour and 40 minutes later our vehicle was north of this mall on a side street.  i felt extreme fear saw bright lights. 3/23/15  after nostril surgery triangular shaped object came out of nose.

content.detailedDescription:
Originally , two orbs southwest, two heading east, one banks sw to north, head to all go back towards lockheed dynamics, per usual, i do believe they are in on this. the 6th orb much lower, south to north, bank to lockheed.
per last sighting, this has become daily after first report.

went outside due to immediate upheaval in home, a lot of unnecessary frustration and anxiety, had to get out of environment and go outside, for this display, this made me, my husband physically ill, as it does each time, we see these which is becoming daily, and also in major plain site in daylight around lockheed and ridge mar. these are not craft. we know this now. 

we have no clue how this worked, but with prayer they seem to fly away faster, and also in daylight, just disappear... i think this may be our tool, whether u are christian or not, im not, i have no clue what my spirituality really is,. but i know since first encounter, my family has gone through enormous change. i do believe this may be age of ascension. as we know not one thing about chakras, and the event of this opening in us, was surprising, it is a very emotional and very spiritual awakening. now, as we see them, we pray, it seems to work... this have no solid form, they r not craft, they are demons i believe, some sort of evil in our sky. call me crazy, u see em pray, they run!!!!

we are going to get good cam, we are also going to say this, we have seen large looking white normal jets leave lockheed, turn to orbs, then flash and disappear.. 

be nice if the gov would let us have this tech too i guess. make for less gas money i have to earn.

we need to stop waiting for our worthless gov to disclose, why do we need them to tell us what the truth is, this is real folx, and the truth deepns and gets worse, i suggest loooking deeply into antarctica and the reasons john kerry went, and why a 35 year ban... they say no scientist are there even, thats bs, u can live track them on earthmaps. each nation that has it's section to protect of antarctica has many scientists there.

this is the hub, the key, these things are not our friends, none of them are. none of them
content.summary: 6 orbs, one predominant area permiter to lockheed dynamics.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out by field investigator l. flechtner #18809, with witness on the phone
at mufon h.Q.On 12/06/2016.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

every night i would watch the sky at night over phoenix from superior and see this twinkling star light. because superior is a higher elevation than phoenix,
this light seemed to be over phoenix. when i looked at it through binoculars i
saw the twinkling was caused by the light emitting little, smaller lights falling off of it. they never veered far from the original light. the light was colored yellow, and blueish yellow. 
then one night i saw a triangle fade in next to the twinkling light. the triangle had a yellow light in front,a blueish yellow light in the middle, and
solid green lights in the back. it faded out after a short period of time. the 
triangle was larger than the twinkling light, but not as large as the "phoenix
lights" triangle.
i saw the twinkling light in the sky the whole time i lived at the arboretum apartments in superior.

i have had other sighting as well.
content.summary: I would watch the sky at night over phoenix from superior and see this twinkling star light

content.detailedDescription: I was at my boyfriends house & i was sleeping over as i usually do on the weekends. i went out front for a cigarette & after i closed the door & turned around i saw two orbs. the one to my far left repeatedly hid behind trees, peaking out as i often see them do while the one to the right stayed in my sight. i took out my phone & took a few pictures & a short video before i sat down to smoke. they didn't stay too long. the one to the right vanished first after following the other a bit behind the trees & the one that was peaking in & out flew off to the left before going out. when i recorded this video i heard no noises but when i reviewed it, the first couple of seconds has a weird hum/static noise.
content.summary: Went out for a cigarette & a orb peak in & out from behind trees as another stayed pretty stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my patio which faces north and first saw a grey streak with an elliptical path from east to west at mid horizon. then about 30 seconds later i saw another object which i first was a satellite which was only about as half bright as the stars. the object was first sighted to the right of cassiopia but then turned in a southerly direction and then made a very tight 360 degree turn to the right and then flashed off to the west on approximately the same trajectory as the first object. there was no sound and i thought the objects were quite high.
content.summary: Grey object first sighted east of cassiopia i originally thought it was a satellite.

content.detailedDescription:
Friday night december 2nd, 2016, i was sitting in my hot tub out on my back patio. i was facing south towards the back of my house. 
  i heard the faint chop - chop- chop of a helicopter and just a few seconds after i heard the first "chop" i saw a red light (i assume it was a running light from the helicopter) in the sky emerge heading southwest. this is a fairly common occurrence here as we see news and traffic choppers fairly often. 
  the chopper proceeded south for approximately 30 seconds. i didn't give it another thought and went back to enjoying the tub. within another 30 seconds, i started hearing the chopper again but this time (even over the noise of the 6 hp tub jets) it was getting considerably louder. i leaned up and looked towards the sound and the red light was coming back towards my way on a north/northeast heading and moving fast, very fast. 
  at this point the rotor chop was getting so incredibly loud, i reached over and turned the tub jets off because i couldn't believe what i was hearing and now feeling in my chest. the chop was so powerful that i then realized this has to be a military chopper. i couldn't see the chopper itself yet but i could see it's red running light (the only light visible) as it approached.
  a few seconds later, the chopper passed right in front of me just above treetop height. when it passed by, the chopper was completely black as in there were no lights emanating from the cabin, just the red running light.
  this is were it gets interesting... just in front of the chopper, about 50 to 70 feet, was a tubular shaped glowing white object silently screaming by. i know it made no discernible noise simply because the chopper thump thump thump is intermittent. if this was a jet or a missile going that fast, i feel very confident it would have made a loud jet engine or rocket sound. it was silent.
  i reported this to mufon because of the following reasons:
1. it was an extremely fast and powerful military style chopper
2. it was flying way below legal altitude (just above treetops)
3. it was obvious to me that the chopper was chasing something due to        it's very fast and erratic flight path
4. right as it passed in front of my line of sight, i saw what it was chasing as decribed above.
5. when the chopper abruptly changed course, it was now coming towards me and did not have a white light coming out of the front of it.
6. and finally, because this all happened over a residential area.
content.summary: Black military chopper chasing ufo over cumming georgia
